title: Alarm clock for android wear
summary: Wear alarm clock for android smart watch.Play alarm on watch and phone.
description: Alarm clock is simple to use app for android smart watch that allow you play alarms in your watch and/or your phone.-------------------------------Actions-------------------------------Add alarmChange alarmRemove alarm-------------------------------Features-------------------------------Alarm mode:  Mute/Vibrate/Beep/Vibrate and Beep                      Beep if device has speaker capabilitiesTurn alarm on/offCyclic alarmsPlay alarms on watch and/or phone.-------------------------------Languages-------------------------------English中国FrançaisDeutschItaliano日本人한국의PortuguêsPусскийEspañol
descriptionHTML:
Alarm clock is simple to use app for android smart watch that allow you play alarms in your watch and/or your phone.

-------------------------------
Actions
-------------------------------
Add alarm
Change alarm
Remove alarm

-------------------------------
Features
-------------------------------
Alarm mode: Mute/Vibrate/Beep/Vibrate and Beep
Beep if device has speaker capabilities
Turn alarm on/off
Cyclic alarms
Play alarms on watch and/or phone.

-------------------------------
Languages
-------------------------------
English
中国
Français
Deutsch
Italiano
日本人
한국의
Português
Pусский
Español
comments: Did not work on LG watch R Tried several different time settings.  Never went off or gave any indication of an alarm.   Since update works great now.
Phone app Would have been 5 stars if the alarms could be edited from the phone app and if it had setting to repeat the alarm...
Needs an update to include a repeat function.  Pretty useless otherwise.
Sound missing Why is this just vibrating without sound?
Well done Just needs daily repeat alarm ability.
